home.title: Red Pine
home.subtitle: Digital Asset Trading Platform
home.description: Opening up the world of crypto for everyone. We are building a secure and compliant platform with staking, crypto-native products, and accessible trading for the masses.

reliable.title: Accessible

about.title: About Red Pine
about.subtitle: Opening up crypto for everyone with compliance and accessibility

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Red Pine is being built to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone. We believe the future of digital assets should be open, secure, and compliant. By simplifying access to staking, crypto-native products, and trading, we're opening up the entire crypto ecosystem for the masses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To democratize access to digital assets by building a secure and compliant platform from the ground up. We're enabling everyone to participate in staking, DeFi, and crypto-native products while meeting Hong Kong's regulatory standards.

whyHK.title: Why Hong Kong
whyHK.content: We are Hong Kongers who are passionate about the digital asset industry. Hong Kong's progressive regulatory framework and position as a global financial hub make it an ideal location for a compliant digital asset exchange. We are building Red Pine to contribute to Hong Kong's digital asset ecosystem.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Your assets' security is our top priority

intro.title: Multi-Layer Security Architecture
intro.content: Red Pine is being built with institutional-grade security measures to protect your digital assets. Our comprehensive security approach includes multiple layers of protection.

coldStorage.title: üè¶ Cold Storage
coldStorage.desc: The majority of digital assets will be stored in offline cold wallets, protected from online threats.

multiSig.title: üîê Multi-Signature
multiSig.desc: Multi-signature technology requiring multiple approvals for transactions.

ddos.title: üõ°Ô∏è DDoS Protection
ddos.desc: Advanced protection against distributed denial-of-service attacks.

twoFA.title: üîë 2FA Authentication
twoFA.desc: Two-factor authentication for all account access and withdrawals.

monitoring.title: üîç Real-Time Monitoring
monitoring.desc: 24/7 security monitoring and anomaly detection systems.

infrastructure.title: üèóÔ∏è Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.desc: Enterprise-grade infrastructure with regular security audits.

compliance.title: Compliance & Regulation
compliance.content: We are building Red Pine to comply with Hong Kong's regulatory framework for virtual asset trading platforms. Our commitment to compliance ensures a secure and trustworthy environment for all users.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: User data is encrypted and stored securely. We implement best practices in data protection and privacy, ensuring your personal information remains confidential.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Get ready for launch - Support coming soon

launch.a: We are currently in development. Stay tuned for updates on our launch timeline.

crypto.a: Details on supported cryptocurrencies will be announced closer to launch. We plan to support major digital assets in compliance with Hong Kong regulations.

who.a: Red Pine will serve both retail and institutional clients. Specific eligibility requirements will be shared during our launch announcement.

licensed.a: We are building Red Pine to meet Hong Kong's regulatory requirements for virtual asset trading platforms.

updates.a: Check back on this website regularly for updates on our launch and platform features.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For general inquiries, please check back soon for our contact details.
